author: Quentin McPhatter
text:
Good afternoon all,
Does anyone have a copy of an inspection review/report form that is used by their building inspectors as they inspect various structures for building code requirements?  I am looking for a form that can used in triplicate and  provided to general contractors, subcontractors, etc. after an inspection has taken place.  
Thanks in advance for all of your help!
Quentin T. McPhatter
Deputy City Manager
City of Kingsland, Georgia
title: Building Inspection Review/Report Form
